Welcome

Hi, my name is ReduxFlakes, and this is my little home on the internet and a tribute to the old personal web.

On this portal, you can find a lot of stuff related to old tech and music. This is also a place where I talk about myself and share guides and resources for people in the same realm.

If you ended up liking my web portal, head to the Support section to learn how to support my work. Thank you! - ReduxFlakes
